lead_paragraph: The authorities carried out at least 157 executions in 2015, with beheadings reaching their highest level in two decades, advocacy groups said.
snippet: The authorities carried out at least 157 executions in 2015, with beheadings reaching their highest level in two decades, advocacy groups said.

headline.print_headline: Middle East; Saudi Arabia: Executions Rise

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations

abstract: Human rights groups report Saudi Arabia executed 157 people in 2015, including 63 people for drug-related crimes, with highest number of beheadings in two decades.
